 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסְכֵּן‎</span> **adjective** ==poor==, only Ecclesiastes (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic ***id.***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>2632</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>382</sup>; √ dubious; usually derived from III.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סכן‎</span> q. v.; perhaps loan-word; according to [[BDB#Jen|Jen]]<sup>ZA iv (1889), 271 f</sup> [[BDB#Zim|Zim]]<sup>ib. vii (1892), 353</sup> = Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***muškênu, beggar, needy one)***</u></abbr>; — always absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span>: — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְחָכָם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֶלֶד מ‎</span> [[Eccl.4.13|Eccl 4:13]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֶלֶח זֶקֵן וּכְסִיל‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָכָם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ מ‎</span> [[Eccl.9.15|Eccl 9:15]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָאִישׁ הַמּ‎</span> v[[Eccl.9.15|Eccl 9:15]] as substantive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמּ‎</span> v[[Eccl.9.16|Eccl 9:16]] ***the poor man***.
